title: Interpretation of seeing a wasp in a dream according to Ibn Sirin and Nabulsi

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a wasp in a dream, according to the interpretation of Ibn Sirin and Nabulsi, around us in nature and among the categories of insects are many types of frightening and poisonous insects, some of which are friendly to humans and many others and live in various areas on the surface of the Earth, and among these types the wasp is considered one of the insects that frighten people. Because if he feels danger from someone who stings him, so when a person sees a wasp in a dream, fear arises from sleep, so in this article today we will learn together about me, the interpretation of seeing a wasp in a dream according to the interpretation of Ibn Sirin and Nabulsi.Interpretation of the dream of seeing a wasp in a dream, interpretation of Ibn Sirin and mentioned. Translated by Ibn Sirin, seeing a wasp in a dream is one of the hateful dreams that indicate hatred, envy, and hatred. Hearing the sound of a wasp in a dream indicates sighs and gossip for the dreamer. If a wasp eats in a dream, this vision indicates family problems, quarrels, or problems between friends. In the event that Dreaming of killing drones, this vision is a sign of the strength of the dreamer’s character and this dream also indicates victory over enemies. If the dreamer sees many wasps in a dream, then this vision symbolizes many battles and wars in reality. As for a wasp sting in a dream, It is one of the hateful dreams that indicate a large number of enemies in the dreamer’s life. Interpretation of the dream of seeing a wasp in a dream is the interpretation of Al-Nabulsi. Al-Nabulsi mentioned that seeing a wasp in a dream is one of the hateful dreams that indicate the theft of money in reality. If you see the death of a wasp, this indicates that you are getting closer to God and avoiding doing With some things that make God lie and spend. If the dreamer sees many wasps entering the dreamer’s house, then this vision indicates the presence of bad people from the neighbors and this vision is a warning message to the dreamer about them. If the dreamer sees himself bumping into wasps in a dream, then this dream indicates getting rid of them. Of his enemies in reality. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a wasp in a dream for a single woman: If an unmarried woman sees that a wasp is stinging her, then this vision is long-term, and indicates that someone is not suitable for her in her relationship with her, and this vision is a message to her not to rush in making a choice. If an unmarried woman sees wasps You attack her in a dream. This vision indicates her marriage to a person with bad morals, and God knows best. But if an unmarried woman dreams that she is killing a wasp, this dream symbolizes something bad that will happen to her, and God knows best. If you see a yellow wasp, this dream indicates that there is a lot of envy. And haters in reality. Interpretation of a dream about wasps for a married woman in a dream. As for a married woman, if she sees a wasp in a dream and is afraid of it, this vision reflects her feelings of anxiety, fear, and sadness in reality. Seeing a red wasp is one of the hateful dreams that indicate theft, and God knows best. If you see a black wasp, this It indicates that you will face problems in marriage. If a married woman sees that a wasp is chasing her, this indicates that there is someone who hates her in reality and hates her. If she sees a wasp’s nest, this dream indicates that she will suffer from injustice from those close to her, and this

title: Interpretation of a dream about feces for an unmarried woman by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about feces for a single woman in a dream. Seeing feces is one of the most disgusting and disgusting visions for the fortune teller, but seeing it in a dream can express many happy events in life. It is a sign of the ability to maintain and comfort. From sadness, and also warns you of some things, and we will tell you more about all the consequences of reading this article. Interpretation of a dream about feces for a single woman Ibn Shaheen's vision of this feces with a bad smell in the dream of an unmarried woman indicates the presence of bad friends in her life, so she must beware of this company and protect herself with the Holy Qur’an. Dreaming that you are sitting on a chair in front of people is a good vision and indicates that you will earn a lot of money through inheritance or by entering into a project from which you will earn money. Dreaming of bird or animal droppings is a good vision and predicts many positive changes and the fulfillment of an important and beloved desire. Feeling difficulty in removing feces is a sign of serious problems and problems in life, but you are able to get rid of them, according to Al-Nabulsi. Interpretation of a dream about feces for an unmarried woman by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin believes that feces in an unmarried woman's dream can bring her a lot of good if she is a student, as this vision indicates excellence and obtaining the highest grades, and it is also one of the visions that portends it. Marriage approach. If an unmarried girl sees feces in the toilet, this is a good vision and represents achieving goals and getting a lot of money soon. The vision also represents promotion at work and winning a high position. If an unmarried woman sees feces filling her underwear, this is a metaphor for bad qualities and bad morals, but if it smells bad, it is a symbol of being exposed to a major scandal and revealing many secrets about her life. The dream of feces on the outer clothing of an unmarried woman is a warning of having a relationship with a person who has many bad qualities and will cause many problems and troubles in her life, and she must be careful. Feces in front of someone I know Interpretation of a single dream The girl appears in front of people or anyone she knows unintentionally. It is an expression of manufacturing chaotic behavior that will make her distort the world. A cover for scandal. Seeing a girl standing in front of people is an indication of a secret relationship in her life and soon her matter will be revealed to people, so she must be careful of this vision. Al-Osaimi says that seeing defecation in front of people and feeling wrong and very embarrassed among people is an indication of the ugliness of the behaviors you are doing, but you will stop them soon. Interpretation of a dream about yellow feces for a single woman Many jurists and interpreters see that yellow feces in a single girl’s dream is a bad vision that portends a health problem and she should see a doctor immediately. If you see dark feces, this is a warning of obstacles and problems in life, but you will overcome them and life will return to normal. Eating feces in a single woman’s dream The dream of eating feces in a dream for an unmarried girl without feeling disgusted is one of the best visions

title: Seeing an old friend in a dream

preview.html: Seeing an old friend in a dream A friend is considered the link and safety pillar of life if he is a loyal person, and he is often like the brother that the mother did not have, but what do you see an old friend in a dream? What are the connotations and interpretations of this dream? This is what we will share with you on our website. Various explanations: Dreaming about a friend indicates joy and happiness in life, and also indicates the dreamer’s need to meet that friend. Seeing an old friend in a dream expresses the presence of some things that are on the dreamer’s mind and he wants to talk about them, but if he sees his friend healthy and not sick , it means that he will visit him in reality. Thus.Seeing an old friend laughing in a dream means that you will soon hear happy news. As for sitting with a childhood friend, it indicates the dreamer’s desire to return to his old self and his desire for positive change and to stay away from the negative actions he takes. Seeing childhood friends is a psychological sight, and Miller said that people who always see childhood friends in a dream are people who suffer from loneliness and are looking for... Always about themselves and want to talk and show what is in their hearts. Seeing an old friend in a dream standing on a high position means that the dreamer is gaining a prominent position and also expresses the occurrence of positive changes and improvement in life, achieving promotion and an increase in livelihood soon. Seeing an old friend sick in a dream is an expression of His excessive stress and exhaustionSeeing an old friend in a dream can be an expression of the friend's suffering and his need for the fortuneteller to stand by his side. Seeing an old friend in a dream about single people Interpreters of dreams say about this vision that it indicates that she hears good news and that something important will happen in her life that will change a lot For her. But if the unmarried woman was previously engaged and an old friend appears in her dream, this means that she will return to her first love for the second time. Seeing a beloved friend is desirable and indicates the fulfillment of a desire and a great goal that the girl seeks. If she dreams of a friend crying and suffering Of distress, it means that this person needs help, and seeing it expresses the girl’s suffering from many worries and problems during this period. An old friend in the dream of an unmarried woman who suffers from worries and problems, a vision that indicates salvation from these problems and the beginning of a new life with many Of good things. While chasing an old friend is undesirable, it may indicate the discovery of a dangerous secret that the girl has been hiding from everyone for a long time. Seeing an old friend in a dream for a married woman is one of the visions that express marital happiness and comfort in life, but if it seems bad This means that there are many problems in a woman’s life. Seeing a childhood friend indicates love and expresses the woman’s desire to return to childhood, get rid of the problems she suffers from, and stay away from responsibilities. A friend with whom there are competitors in your dream indicates the end of disputes and problems with him, but seeing An angry friend means that the dreamer is suffering from stress and tension in her life. As for seeing the colleague she loves

title: Interpretation of a dream about my mother dancing at a wedding in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about my mother dancing at a wedding in a dream. Below we will learn about the interpretation of a dream about my mother dancing at a wedding in a dream, and is it good or bad, and other details that interest you. Interpretation of a dream about my mother dancing at a wedding in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my mother dancing in a dream. A wedding party in a dream. Perhaps dancing expresses the mother’s illness, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees the mother dancing in a dream, this may indicate anxiety, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. When a married woman sees her mother dancing, it may be an indication of illness, and God knows best. If an unmarried girl sees her mother dancing in a dream, she may This leads to illness, and God knows the unseen.Interpretation of a dream of a brother singing in a dreamInterpretation of a dream of a brother singing in a dream A vision of singing in a beautiful voice may carry, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees someone singing in a beautiful voice, this may lead to good things, God willing. When you see someone singing loudly in a dream, it may That this is a sign of bad things, and God knows the unseen. As it can express failure, and God knows everything that is not seen. When you see the dead person singing with a beautiful voice in a dream, this may be a sign of trouble for the dreamer, and God knows the unseen. title: Seeing the sea in a dream with someone you love

preview.html: It also indicates this girl’s trip abroad with her partner, and through the following lines from our Mufsir website, we will show you the vision of the sea in a dream. Interpretation of seeing the sea in a dream with someone she loves for a single girl. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is walking on the sea with someone She knows him and loves him. This dream indicates that this girl will be engaged to a relative of this person. He is blessed with joy, sustenance, and a happy and beautiful life. When an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is looking at the sea happily with the person she loves. This dream indicates that this girl will live A life full of calm and stability. In the next few days you will have a new job. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is looking at the person she loves with optimism while sitting on the sea. This dream indicates that this girl will achieve her dreams that she wanted to come true, and that this girl She excels in her experiences. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is sitting with someone she loves, but she was crying. This dream indicates that this girl is experiencing a lot of sadness and anxiety. She cannot overcome all the problems on her own. Whereas, if an unmarried girl sees in Her dream is that she is eating with the person she loves, and is calmly looking at the sea. This dream indicates the stability that she will experience and the calm that will complete her life. And they will overcome everything they find. See also: Interpretation of a dream about a calm and clear sea for a married woman. Interpretation of seeing the sea in a dream with someone she loves in a dream For a married woman: If a married woman sees in her dream that she is sitting and looking at the sea happily with someone she loves. This dream indicates that this woman is happy with her life and that she loves her husband. She cares about him and that she is kind and a creature who manages the affairs of her home with love. When a married woman sees in her dream that she is looking at the sea With someone she loves. This dream indicates that this woman will soon hear happy news about her pregnancy, God willing. Whereas, if a married woman sees in her dream that she is sad for the person she loves, and she is looking at the sea. This dream indicates that this woman is not happy in her dream. Her life. She worries and faces many problems and issues in her life, but she will get rid of them quickly. When a married woman sees in her dream that she is walking on the sea with someone she loves, but he fell. This dream indicates that this woman will fall ill with an illness, but this is not serious and she will recover from it easily. If a married woman dreams that she is swimming with someone she loves but she cannot get out of it. This vision indicates that this woman will accumulate many debts from her husband. It will be difficult for them to pay them, and they will have many problems in their lives. It also indicates that this woman She has people in her life who are trying to destroy her, and in their hearts there is hatred and jealousy that she must stay away from. Interpretation of seeing the sea in a dream with someone she loves in a dream about a man and its meaning. If a man sees in his dream that he is looking at the sea with someone he loves, then this man is happy. This dream indicates that this The person will hear good news in his life. He will be responsible at work, and he will rise among employers and

title: Interpretation of seeing a shepherd with sheep and cows in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a shepherd with sheep and cows in a dream by Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, Ibn Shaheen, Ibn Katheer, and Imam Al-Sadiq. Scientists and jurists interpreted dreams and visions through the website Vision roy2a.com as seeing sheep and raising them in a dream as one of the visions that indicate good upbringing of the dreamer’s children and his keen interest in them, as Mutton is one of the most beloved meats for humans because it contains great benefits and a distinctive flavor. We will talk about the interpretation of this vision through our topic on the single girl, the married woman, the pregnant woman, the man, the young man, and the divorced woman. What is the interpretation of a single man who sees a shepherd in a dream? Seeing an unmarried girl buying a quantity Raising a large sheep in a dream means that she will bear great responsibilities and pressures in life and that her family will depend on her in all affairs. An unmarried girl sees a shepherd in a dream, and her great happiness with them is evidence of her admiration for many things in her life and her remarkable success in university. Seeing an unmarried woman in a dream raising Animals and helping the shepherd in raising them indicates her constant thinking about marriage and forming a happy family. What is the interpretation of a married woman seeing a shepherd in a dream? A married woman sees a shepherd in a dream. His great interest in them suggests her annoyance because of her life’s many problems and problems and trying to get out of this crisis. Seeing a married woman buying the largest quantity Of sheep and raising them to the maximum extent indicates ongoing obstacles and problems and an attempt to solve them as quickly as possible without any loss. Seeing a married woman taking care of her animals and being very happy with them is an example of her constant love and care for her children and her efforts to protect her family from any problem that disturbs their mood. What is the interpretation of a pregnant woman seeing a shepherd in a dream? Seeing a pregnant woman in a dream raising sheep and animals and her excessive interest in them suggests that she bears full responsibility and is extremely afraid that her children will be in any danger. Seeing a pregnant woman with a large sheep in a dream indicates that her husband will bring goodness and a lot of food. Seeing a pregnant woman looking at many large animals And her concern for them because of their illness shows her love for charity, helping the poor, and her good behavior among people. What is the interpretation of an unmarried young man who sees a shepherd in a dream? A single young man sees a shepherd in a dream, and his constant search for him and establishing his own business indicates extreme exhaustion in searching for the appropriate job for him and assuming a senior position. In the country. Seeing a young man raising sheep and eating their meat indicates happy and joyful days in his life and his relationship with the love of his life. Seeing a lot of sheep in a young man’s dream and trying to stay away from them indicates a responsibility that is difficult to bear and that he is trying to escape from. Seeing in a dream that he is eating a sheep with a beautiful girl is a sign of his love. Seeing a shepherd in a dream for Nabulsi indicates the status of the martyr, his standing, and his great position in society and among the people.

title: Interpretation of seeing war in a dream for a married woman, Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing war in a dream is one of the information that many people are interested in obtaining. We find that seeing war in a dream is one of the dreams that causes fear and panic to its owner, so scholars have been interested in providing different interpretations related to seeing war in a dream. Interpretation of seeing war in a dream for a married woman with a son SirenInterpretation of seeing war in a dream for a single womanWhen an unmarried woman sees war in a dream, this is interpreted as an indication that the unmarried girl will go through many bad events that greatly affect her life. If an unmarried girl dreams that she is fighting with her family, then this dream It indicates the presence of some family problems. If an unmarried girl sees a war in a dream with an indication of her participation in this war, this means that she receives a lot of good news and also indicates that her wedding is approaching. An unmarried girl, when she sees in a dream that she is participating in the war And that the war ends with victory for her, evidence of the end of the crises she is going through. Interpretation scholars also reported that a woman seeing war in a dream is evidence of the presence of certain individuals who are harming her. Read more: Interpretation of seeing a donkey in a dream by Ibn SirinSee also: Seeing a promise in a dream Interpretation of seeing war in A married woman’s dream: A married woman’s vision of war in a dream can carry positive and negative indicators, according to the symbols in the dream. Ibn Sirin gave an interpretation of a married woman seeing war in a dream, including that this dream indicates the imminent pregnancy of this woman. We also find that when a married woman sees war and military equipment in a dream, this indicates the stability of marital life. Another interpretation has been presented that clarifies Seeing a married woman fighting with her husband in a dream indicates that there is a lot of marital strife between her and her husband. The interpretation differs when a married woman sees a war in a dream, with an indication of missiles falling on her house, as this dream indicates that there are some neighbors seeking to harm her. Harmful to her. Read more: Interpretation of seeing a dinosaur in a dream See also: Backgrounds in a dream Interpretation of seeing war in a dream for a pregnant woman When a pregnant woman sees war in a dream, we find that this dream is interpreted as an indication that the pregnant woman does not face any health problems. We also find that it When a pregnant woman dreams that she is quarreling with her husband, this dream indicates that there are many disagreements between them. If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she is fighting with a sword, this means that she has given birth to a male child. Likewise, if she sees that her husband is hitting her with a sword, this indicates that she has given birth. For his child. Interpretation of seeing war in a dream for a divorced woman. In general, we find that seeing war in a divorced woman’s dream is evidence of her resistance to many challenges. It also indicates that she bears great responsibilities, and Ibn Sirin explained that seeing war in a divorced woman’s dream is evidence that she is facing psychological pressures and crises. Many. See also: Seeing pins in a dream. Interpretation of seeing war in

title: Interpretation of a dream about a turkey in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a turkey in a dream: They differ in people’s situations and circumstances and also differ in the case of the rooster, but seeing a turkey in a dream, whether it is in his situation or the person’s situation, shows many promising interpretations of goodness, and a lot of nutrition and positivity. Benefits, high status, and advancement in life. You may also be interested in meeting a camel in a dream. But there is only one case that differs, which is dreaming of a dead turkey, which indicates bad luck. You may also be interested in the following: Seeing a promise in a dream Interpretation of seeing a turkey in The dream is considered one of the dreams that have a large number of interpretations. The interpretation of seeing a turkey in a dream is as follows: A turkey indicates profit, abundant money, trade, and an abundance of crops on farms. The appearance of a turkey in a dream for a rich person means that God will bless his offspring and his money. The appearance of a turkey indicates A dream for a poor person means upcoming profit and livelihood. If you see yourself cooking a turkey in a dream, this indicates good news about happy events that will occur in the dreamer’s life. Seeing a turkey in a dream Interpretation of a dream about a turkey in a dream for a single woman Seeing a turkey in a dream is considered one of the strangest Visions that indicate a large number of different things. The interpretation of the vision is as follows for single people: If a girl dreams that she is sleeping, a red turkey, then this is a vision that indicates her close relationship with a big and high-ranking person and she will feel happy and at peace with him. If an unmarried girl sees that she She buys a turkey, this indicates that she wants to marry a young man who is higher than her social level and is rich, but the matter is different if she sees that she is selling a turkey, this indicates her closeness to her problems and the possibility that her marriage will not be completed. The death of a turkey indicates the loss of someone close to her. If she sees For a single girl, seeing a turkey in her dream means that she has ambitions and qualifications that will help her find a suitable job and succeed in her work. You may be interested in: Seeing home and room furniture in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a turkey for a married woman in a dream. Seeing a white turkey in a dream for a married woman indicates To the purity of her intentions and her desire to do good to everyone she knows and that she will receive a lot of goodness as a reward for her. But if she sees a black turkey, this indicates that there are problems in her life that she is currently suffering from, but she will overcome them with dignity. If she sees that she is buying a turkey, this indicates her generosity, kindness, and endless gift to her children, and her diligence in raising the best upbringing for them, and it also shows that her children They achieve success, distinction and high status. Husband. If a married woman sees a turkey in her bedroom in her dream, this indicates her husband’s love for her, his appreciation for her, and the stability of her life. You may be interested: Crying and oppression in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about cooking a turkey. If a married woman dreams that she is cooking a turkey, this means that her husband has a status He is high in his job, which makes him a lot of money and makes her live a luxurious life. But if

title: Interpretation of seeing a guava tree in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a guava tree in a dream or dream by Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir, Al-Nabulsi, Ibn Shaheen, or Imam Al-Sadiq via the vision website Roy2a.com in the interpretation of seeing a guava tree, whether single, married, pregnant, or divorced, with its various meanings. Today, through the vision website, we will discuss the interpretation of seeing a guava tree in a dream in detail, based on the opinion of major translators such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir, Al-Nabulsi, or Imam Al-Sadiq, so follow us. What is Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing a guava tree in a dream? Ibn Sirin explained that seeing a guava tree In a dream, it symbolizes the end of problems and difficulties in the dreamer’s life. The dream of seeing a guava tree with good fruits in a merchant’s dream is a sign of increasing halal profits and profitable trading. The dream of buying guava fruit in a dream is evidence of the dreamer’s fears and sorrows. Seeing a girl offering guava seeds in a bachelor’s dream symbolizes His marriage is approaching. She dreams of a married woman offering her a small guava fruit. It announces a happy life with her husband and her family. See also: Interpretation of seeing guava in a dream. What is the interpretation of eating guava in a dream for a single woman? Seeing a single girl in her dream that she is eating guava without seeds and with ease is an indication of the ease of obtaining Blessed livelihood. A dream about eating hard guava fruit for an unmarried woman indicates the difficulty of earning a living and requires a lot of effort and time. A dream about eating yellow guava fruit in a single woman’s dream is a symbol of the beginning of illness. What is the interpretation of a dream about picking guava fruits? A dream about picking guava in a dream is a symbol of stability and happiness in life. Vision Yellow guava fruit: It portends illness, lack of money, or the appearance of misfortunes. A dream of picking guava fruit is a symbol of increasing livelihood and money, especially if it is green. See also: Interpretation of seeing a pumpkin in a dream. Guava in a dream for a married woman. A dream of a married woman picking guava fruits is a sign of achieving goals and desires. Seeing eating fresh and delicious guava. In a married woman’s dream, it symbolizes the end of sorrows and worries. A married woman’s dream of spoiled guava is evidence of moral corruption. A husband’s dream of buying guava in a woman’s dream is evidence of an increase in goodness coming to them. What is the interpretation of drinking guava juice in a dream? A dream of drinking guava juice in a dream indicates the coming of a period. Full of happiness in the dreamer’s life and the end of his suffering and tribulations. Drinking guava juice in a dream is a symbol of luxury and love of life. The dream of drinking guava juice in a dream indicates the coming of relief after distress. A single girl dreams of drinking guava juice, a sign of his kindness. See also: Interpretation of seeing apricots in a dream. What is the interpretation of rotten guava? In a dream? Jurists have explained that seeing a spoiled guava in a dream is an unpleasant vision. Dreaming of a spoiled guava It symbolizes the accumulation of problems and fears in the dreamer’s life. Seeing a spoiled guava in a dream It indicates a waste of money and corruption of character. See also: Interpretation of seeing a guava in a dream We are pleased on the site to see Receive your dreams about “Interpretation of seeing a guava tree in a dream,” through comments and a team will

title: Interpretation of a dream about menstruation for a single woman married to a pregnant woman who sees menstrual blood

preview.html: We present to you a dream that menstrual blood came out of me, and the meaning of blood staining, and the interpretation of swimming in blood, and menstruation on clothes, and heavy menstruation for an unmarried woman at a different time, and bleeding from the vulva, the menstrual cycle for a young girl. Interpretation of menstrual blood coming out for a single girl. Menstrual blood and its coming out indicates her sins. Or her distance from religion in some of her deeds, which indicates an illness that will afflict her or severe pain in the coming period. It may be a recurring sin that she commits in her life and her heart is attached to it, such as doubts about men’s relationships and conversations. And if she did ghusl after her menstruation as a repentance for her sin, it appears that he will get married soon. It could mean sustenance from money or Kindness refers to the happiness and joy that you will receive according to the amount of blood that is shed. As for the young girl or the desperate old woman, her menstruation indicates the paradox of life and death. The menstruation of an unmarried woman is a sign of the removal of her virginity in marriage or is forbidden. Seeing menstrual blood bleeding for a pregnant woman. Menstruation means the pregnant woman who gives birth to a male child, which makes her happy. He honors her and his father, and Al-Nabulsi agrees with him that she will give birth to a good son. Seeing menstrual blood for a married woman indicates the worries and depression of a married woman. The intensity of the blood indicates her separation from her husband or his travel and her distance from her if her husband has intercourse with her during her menstrual period. If she does ghusl after her menstruation, it means that she is traveling with her husband if he has intercourse with her, which is food. It is better and an expiation if it is purified after menstrual blood. The wife who has reached despair of childbirth and sees in her dream that she is menstruating, then sees her giving birth and giving birth. And the wife who sees in her dream that her husband is having intercourse with her while she is still menstruating in the dream, then seeing it shows that she and her husband have moved from the city in which she lives. To another city. Interpretation of menstruation in a dream: Whoever is stained with blood or soiled with blood, then he earns haraam money and does not benefit from it. Whoever swims or has his hands stained with blood and touches it, then returns with haraam money and lives with it. Blood that comes down for no reason on the body indicates people who have bad things to the fortuneteller. At work, at home, or with friends, and it leads to loss. A woman who sees in her dream that she is menstruating, and then sees it indicates that she has committed sins and disobedience. Menstruation in a dream for women and men is evidence of weak faith, lack of religion, and lack of worship. Seeing menstruation, whether the vision is from A woman or man indicates separation between a husband and his wife. An unmarried woman who sees in her dream that she is menstruating, but in reality she is not menstruating and has given up on it, then her vision indicates marriage and marriage. And the barren woman who has given up on giving birth, if she sees in her dream that she is menstruating, then her vision indicates that she is Pregnant and giving birth to a boy. If a merchant or craftsman sees in a dream that his wife is menstruating, then his vision means loss in his trade or work. Interpretation of bleeding in a dream - YouTube

It indicates an illness that afflicts her or severe pain in the coming period. It may be a recurring sin that she commits in her life and her heart is attached to it, such as doubts about men’s relationships and their conversations. And if she washes herself from her menstruation, repentance for her sin shows that she will marry soon. It can mean sustenance from money or kindness to the happiness and joy that she will get according to the amount of blood that is shed. As for the young girl or the desperate old woman, her menstruation indicates the separation of life and death. The menstruation of an unmarried woman is a sign of losing her virginity in marriage or forbidden. Seeing the bleeding of menstrual blood for a pregnant woman means the pregnant woman who gives birth to a male child who makes her happy and honors her and his father. Al-Nabulsi agrees with him that she will give birth to a righteous son. Seeing the menstrual blood of a married woman indicates the worries and depression of a married woman. Heavy blood indicates her separation from her husband or his travel and distance from her if her husband has intercourse with her during her menstrual period. If she washes herself from her menstruation, it means that she travels with her husband if he has intercourse with her. It is food, goodness, and expiation if he is purified after menstrual blood. The wife who has reached despair of childbirth and sees in her dream that she is menstruating, then her vision shows that she gives birth and gives birth. The wife who sees in her dream that her husband is having intercourse with her while she is still menstruating in the dream, then her vision shows that she and her husband have moved from the city in which she lives to another city. Interpretation of menstruation in a dream: Whoever is stained with blood or dirty with blood earns forbidden money and does not benefit from it. Whoever swims or gets his hands stained with blood and touches it, then returns with forbidden money and lives with it. The blood that comes down for no reason on the body indicates people who have bad things for the fortune teller at work or at home or with friends and leads him to loss. The woman who saw in her dream that she Menstruating, then seeing her indicates that she committed sins and disobedience. Menstruation in a dream for a woman and a man is evidence of weak faith, lack of religion, and lack of worship. Seeing menstruation, whether the vision is from a woman or a man, indicates separation between the husband and his wife. An unmarried woman who sees in her dream that she is menstruating, and she is not menstruating in reality and despairs of it, then her vision indicates marriage and marriage. And the barren woman who despairs of childbirth, if she sees in her dream that she is menstruating, then her vision indicates that she is pregnant and gives birth to a boy. If a merchant or craftsman sees in a dream that his wife is menstruating, then his vision means a loss in his trade or work. Interpretation of bleeding in a dream - YouTube
